sentences.english: Three, Yuan Korea Tributary cycle research.
Many conquered nations had to pay tribute to the rulers of ancient Rome.
sentences.chinese: 許多被征服的國家必須向古羅馬的統治者朝貢。

sentences.english: The tributary system is one of the main patterns reflecting the Sino-foreign relations in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 朝貢制度是古代中國對外交往的主要模式之一。

sentences.english: At the same time, the kings in Korea Dynasty must send the diplomatics to Beijing to contribution.
sentences.chinese: 同時，朝鮮國王須定期或不定期地派使節到北京朝貢。
